items.sentence: The story of Tom and Mary's relationships is full of dramatic events.
Tom is at an age where he is more likely to succumb to peer pressure.
Friends are people you can think out loud with. Tom was one of those.
If you control a nation's children, you control that nation's future.
I don't understand why Tom wants to go back to Boston after all that.
I wonder whether a man could live with only two hours' sleep a night.
It's not that I want to have a girlfriend, I just want to be in love.
Tom spent years traveling the globe looking for new species of birds.
The giraffe is one of the most iconic species of the African savanna.
Tom didn't want to work last night, but his boss said that he had to.
